item.title: PLADIS: Pushing the Limits of Attention in Diffusion Models at Inference Time by Leveraging Sparsity
item.description: PLADIS: Sparsity boosts attention for diffusion models, enhancing text-to-image generation at inference time!

item.title: Multi Agent based Medical Assistant for Edge Devices
item.description: On-device multi-agent system overcomes privacy/latency issues in healthcare, enabling personalized, scalable AI assistance.
